subcategories.name: paragraph_dynamics
subcategories.definition: The flow and readability of content based on paragraph length and complexity.

subcategories.name: headings_and_subheadings
subcategories.definition: The organizational effectiveness of content using headings to guide comprehension.

subcategories.name: sentence_variation
subcategories.definition: The rhythm and engagement of writing based on variation in sentence lengths.

subcategories.name: vocabulary_complexity
subcategories.definition: The sophistication of language based on lexical complexity and use of jargon vs. layman's terms.

subcategories.name: formality_spectrum
subcategories.definition: The level of formality vs. informality/conversational tone used in the content.

subcategories.name: emotional_resonance
subcategories.definition: The specific emotions evoked by the content beyond just positive/negative sentiment.

subcategories.name: sentiment_progression
subcategories.definition: The emotional arc or journey that the content takes the reader through.

subcategories.name: narrative_elements
subcategories.definition: The use of storytelling techniques like characters, setting, plot to engage readers.

subcategories.name: perspective_and_voice
subcategories.definition: The impact of using 1st person vs 3rd person perspective and authorial voice.

subcategories.name: cognitive_accessibility
subcategories.definition: How well the content balances informativeness and comprehensibility to maximize audience understanding.

subcategories.name: creativity_and_originality
subcategories.definition: The level of innovative thinking and novel ideas presented in the content.

subcategories.name: opening_hook
subcategories.definition: The attention-grabbing impact of the first line using questions, bold statements, stats, quotes, or stories.

subcategories.name: call_to_action_potency
subcategories.definition: The clarity, compellingness and placement of CTAs in driving audience actions.

subcategories.name: actionable_takeaways
subcategories.definition: The effectiveness of the content in providing practical guidance and inspiring real-world action.

subcategories.name: text_image_synchronicity
subcategories.definition: How well visuals complement and enhance the text content rather than distract.

subcategories.name: visual_reinforcement
subcategories.definition: The use of visuals to strategically emphasize key text messages and data points.

subcategories.name: content_length
subcategories.definition: The impact of total content length on engagement, measured in character ranges.

subcategories.name: readability_scoring
subcategories.definition: The use of readability formulas like Flesch-Kincaid to match content to audience reading levels.
